mapper.select: SELECT BOARD.*, EMPLOYEE.EMPLOYEE_NAME, EMPLOYEE.DEPARTMENT_CODE, EMPLOYEE.RANK_CODE FROM BOARD, EMPLOYEE WHERE BOARD.BOARD_WRITER = EMPLOYEE.EMPLOYEE_NUMBER AND BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_HIT=BOARD_HIT+1 WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, EV.* FROM (SELECT BOARD.*, EMPLOYEE.EMPLOYEE_NAME, EMPLOYEE.DEPARTMENT_CODE, EMPLOYEE.RANK_CODE FROM BOARD, EMPLOYEE WHERE (BOARD_KIND='공지사항' AND EMPLOYEE.EMPLOYEE_NUMBER = BOARD.BOARD_WRITER) AND ${title} LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC) EV) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{startRange} AND #{endRange}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_KIND, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_FILE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_REGDATE, BOARD_HIT) VALUES('공지사항', #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardFile}, #{boardWriter}, SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT BOARD.*, EMPLOYEE.EMPLOYEE_NAME FROM BOARD, EMPLOYEE WHERE BOARD_KIND='공지사항' AND EMPLOYEE.EMPLOYEE_NUMBER = BOARD.BOARD_WRITER ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC) WHERE ${title} LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
